alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Peach (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:14PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bibb, northeastern Peach and northeastern Crawford Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 314 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Lee Pope, or 7 miles southeast of Roberta, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Byron, Payne, Payne City, Cross Keys, Wesleyan, Lizella, Lake Tobesofkee, Jack Brown Estates, Skipperton, and Rutland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
